snippet.description:
Subscribe for more GTLive action! ►►http://bit.ly/1Oo7KH9 
Missed Part 1 of BatPat? Watch Now ► http://bit.ly/GTLbatman1
Continue to Part 3 Now ► http://bit.ly/GTLBatman3
Life is Strange - A Storm is Coming ►► http://bit.ly/2cVZQoi

Renegade Batman continues with episode two, Children of Arkham. Once more I don my cape and cowl - to scour the night, and PISS OFF EVERYONE! For I am the Hero that nobody wants, but that these scumbags deserve (because everyone sucks), for I am BatPat - Dick of the Night. 

Subscribe & hang out with us every day! ►► http://bit.ly/1Oo7KH9
Follow us on Twitter at @MatPatGT and #GTLive

More GTLive Videos:
Epic Dance... FAIL! - Just Dance 2015 ► http://bit.ly/GTLdance15
The Tail of CatPat - New GT Fan Game ►► http://bit.ly/2cLmtNC
Game Theory... THE GAME?!? ►► http://bit.ly/GTtheGame
Happy Wheels 3D - Spill my Guts & Glory ► http://bit.ly/GTLguts
BEAN BOOZLED in Higher or Lower ►► http://bit.ly/GTLbeans
High School 101 - Cheaters Always Win! ► http://bit.ly/GTLhigh
STRANGE Life Goals! - Mario Maker ►► http://bit.ly/1V7SP6N

Don't have much time but need a quick fix? Check out some of our highlight episodes for hilarious moments from our live streams. Here are a few to get you started.

HiLite: Chubby Bunny Sing Off! ► http://bit.ly/1LzAN4D
HiLite: Shocked by Man Muscle! ►► http://bit.ly/1VbxgiC
HiLite: Wii Sports: Ugliest Mii EVER ► http://bit.ly/1QqXRIA

Thanks to David Keller for allowing us use of his sound FX:
http://consumingfireartisticcreations.weebly.com/
snippet.title: EVERYONE HATES BATPAT | Batman The Telltale Series - Episode 2
